com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.adapter

Class DynamicTutorialsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentPagerAdapter
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.adapter.DynamicTutorialsAdapter

  • public class DynamicTutorialsAdapter
extends FragmentPagerAdapter
    View pager adapter to display the supplied dynamic tutorials.
    See Also:
    DynamicTutorial
